title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.8 - Caution arms on vehicles used for selling frozen desserts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.8 - Caution arms on vehicles used for selling frozen desserts

State Regulations
(a) Notwithstanding
subdivision (1) of section
385
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law, vehicles used for selling frozen desserts may
exceed the legal width limitation of 8 feet by up to 18 inches if the overage
is caused solely by a caution arm which conforms to Part 69 of these
regulations. (b) Nothing in this

Part shall be construed as allowing the body of a vehicle used for selling
frozen desserts, excluding a caution arm, to exceed the width limit set by
section
385
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
56.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
